author: fwyzard
body:
Update UCX to version 1.19.0, and disable the use of AVX instructions to support `x86-64-v2`.

See [the release page](https://github.com/openucx/ucx/releases/tag/v1.19.0) for the new features and bug fixes included in the release.
title: Update UCX to version 1.19.0 [15.1.x]
